Explanation: This nodule is solid in composition (+2 points), isoechoic in echogenicity (+1 point), has a wider-than-tall shape (+0 points), and has smooth margins (+0 points). There are no echogenic foci (+0 points). This nodule receives a total of 3 points, placing it in TI-RADS level 3 (3 points, mildly suspicious). TI-RADS recommends FNA for TR3 nodules beginning at 2.5 cm and ultrasound surveillance for nodules measuring 1.5 â€“ 2.4 cm. This nodule measured 2.0 cm, so follow-up ultrasound would be performed at 1, 3 and 5 years.
